tha-ap108:0.3_0: held himself with water, filter, and so hard to find.
tha-ap108:2.1_0: if she struck the water with her hand;
tha-ap108:2.2_0: they ejected space in the air.
tha-ap108:2.3_0: I have cut off the belly,
tha-ap108:5.1_0: Though this sacrifice has been given up,
tha-ap108:5.2_0: the world doesn’t stay in the world.
tha-ap108:5.4_0: having left victory and defeat behind.
tha-ap108:6.4_0: dwelling of the four primary elements.
tha-ap108:7.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap108:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bhūja.
tha-ap108:9.1_0: Sixth with water, honor, respect, reverence, and sixth.
